bike.description: Cr-Mo main frame, internally relieved No Oval Head tube, weld on rotor plate, seat-stay mounted X-wire "U" brake bosses, w/ braze on cable stops, 6mm dropouts, pierced top tube, wrap gusset BB yoke, Tube seat-stay bridge
bike.paint_description: Gloss Battleship Blue, Gloss Moss Green

components.description: Specialized threadless, 1-1/8", reinforced steerer, w/ 1-3/8" blades, w/ u-brake bosses, 6mm drop-outs w/ 38mm OD fork adapters
"Dozer" threadless, 1-1/8", oversized lower cup, with SST ORYG rotor
Specialized,  forged alloy, top load, 55mm reach
Specialized 2-piece, 190mm rise, 640mm width,  8 degree back-sweep, 2 degree-upsweep
Specialized No-flange, Kraton, 140mm
Tektro SBL-06, u-brake, 60mm pads
Tektro SBL-06, u-brake, 60mm pads
Tektro SBL-89, u-brake lever pair, 16mm cable pull
Shimano SFMX-30, 1/2" x 1/8", 16T,  chrome plated
KMC Z-510, 1/2" x 1/8", w/ Anti-drop inner links, 88 links
Specialized 1-piece, heat treated Hi-Ten, 175mm crank arm
Solid alloy disc 44t, 5mm thick, CNC'd center/drive hole and teeth
Specialized, ball-retainer bearing
1/2", Cr-Moly axle, alloy platform, w/ molded pins
Alex MX-22, 20", 48h, single wall alloy, deep profile, ground side wall, braking surface
Specialized alloy, 48h, 14mm Cr-Mo axle, loose ball
Specialized "Flip Side", 48h, alloy, 14mm Cr-Mo axle, right & left side F/W thread, loose ball
14g UCP, w/brass nipples
Specialized AssFault,  20" x 2.0",  black skinwall, 60 tpi, 100 psi
Specialized AssFault,  20" x 2.0",  black skinwall, 60 tpi, 100 psi
20" x 2.0", schraeder valve
Specialized Jumping,  w/8mm rails and X-brace
Alloy micro adjust, 30.9mm/300mm for 8mm rails
Specialized, forged alloy, 2-bolt, 33.7mm/31.7mm
2 axle pegs, alloy fork cap, 38mm OD chain tensioners, chain guard cover, reflectors, owners manual
